languages.text: К Вольному Торговцу обратился высокопоставленный чиновник Администратума, помогавший истребовать у династии Чорда реликвию святого Когнациуса. Ему пришлись по вкусу щедрые взятки, и он желает еще. В обмен на запрошенные богатства он обещает, что в расчеты Администратума закрадется ошибка, и все поставки провизии с агромира Миркус Альфа пойдут на Даргонус, а не на орбитальную крепость Флота "Драгонис II".

The Rogue Trader has been contacted by a high-ranking Administratum official who previously helped with reclaiming a relic of Saint Cognatius from House Chorda. He enjoyed the generous bribes and would like some more. In exchange for the riches requested, he promises that an error will creep into the Administratum's calculations so that all provisions from the agri-world of Mircus Alpha will be shipped to Dargonus instead of the Navy's orbital fortress of Dragonis II.

Ему пришлись по вкусу щедрые взятки, и он желает еще. В обмен на запрошенные богатства он обещает, что в расчеты Администратума закрадется ошибка, и все поставки провизии с агромира Миркус Альфа пойдут на Даргонус, а не на орбитальную крепость Флота "Драгонис II".

languages.text: {mf|El|La} Comerciante Independiente ha recibido un mensaje de un funcionario de alto rango del Administratum que ya ayudó al recuperar una reliquia de san Cognatius de la casa Chorda. Ha disfrutado de los generosos sobornos y pide más. A cambio de las riquezas, promete que se producirá un error en los cálculos del Administratum que hará que las provisiones del mundo agrícola de Mircus Alfa acabarán en Dargonus y no en la fortaleza orbital Dragonis II.
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader has been contacted by a high-ranking Administratum official who previously helped with reclaiming a relic of Saint Cognatius from House Chorda. He enjoyed the generous bribes and would like some more. In exchange for the riches requested, he promises that an error will creep into the Administratum's calculations so that all provisions from the agri-world of Mircus Alpha will be shipped to Dargonus instead of the Navy's orbital fortress of Dragonis II.

traits.locale_text: {mf|El|La} Comerciante Independiente ha recibido un mensaje de un funcionario de alto rango del Administratum que ya ayudó al recuperar una reliquia de san Cognatius de la casa Chorda. Ha disfrutado de los generosos sobornos y pide más. A cambio de las riquezas, promete que se producirá un error en los cálculos del Administratum que hará que las provisiones del mundo agrícola de Mircus Alfa acabarán en Dargonus y no en la fortaleza orbital Dragonis II.

languages.text: {mf|Le libre-marchand|La libre-marchande} a reçu l'appel d'un haut fonctionnaire de l'Administratum qui a précédemment contribué à reprendre une relique de Saint Cognatius à la maison Chorda. Il se trouve qu'il a beaucoup apprécié les pots-de-vin qu'il a touchés à cette occasion, et qu'il n'a pas envie d'en rester là. En échange des richesses qu'il exige, il promet de faire en sorte qu'une erreur se glisse dans les calculs de l'Administratum, de manière à ce que toutes les provisions venant de l'agri-monde de Mircus Alpha soient expédiées à « Dargonus » au lieu de « Dragonis II », la forteresse orbitale de la marine.
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader has been contacted by a high-ranking Administratum official who previously helped with reclaiming a relic of Saint Cognatius from House Chorda. He enjoyed the generous bribes and would like some more. In exchange for the riches requested, he promises that an error will creep into the Administratum's calculations so that all provisions from the agri-world of Mircus Alpha will be shipped to Dargonus instead of the Navy's orbital fortress of Dragonis II.

traits.locale_text: {mf|Le libre-marchand|La libre-marchande} a reçu l'appel d'un haut fonctionnaire de l'Administratum qui a précédemment contribué à reprendre une relique de Saint Cognatius à la maison Chorda. Il se trouve qu'il a beaucoup apprécié les pots-de-vin qu'il a touchés à cette occasion, et qu’il n'a pas envie d'en rester là. En échange des richesses qu'il exige, il promet de faire en sorte qu'une erreur se glisse dans les calculs de l'Administratum, de manière à ce que toutes les provisions venant de l’agri-monde de Mircus Alpha soient expédiées à « Dargonus » au lieu de « Dragonis II », la forteresse orbitale de la marine.

languages.text: 行商浪人收到了内政部某位高级官员的联络。这位官员过去曾帮过忙，从库尔达家族手中取回了一件圣科尼亚蒂乌斯的遗物。他对行商浪人出手阔绰的贿赂念念不忘，又再度找上门来。这一回，作为回报，他承诺会让内政部的计算出现某些小小的差错，让来自穆尔科斯阿尔法星农业世界的物资补给全部运送到达戈努斯，而不是达戈尼斯二号海军轨道要塞。
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader has been contacted by a high-ranking Administratum official who previously helped with reclaiming a relic of Saint Cognatius from House Chorda. He enjoyed the generous bribes and would like some more. In exchange for the riches requested, he promises that an error will creep into the Administratum's calculations so that all provisions from the agri-world of Mircus Alpha will be shipped to Dargonus instead of the Navy's orbital fortress of Dragonis II.

traits.locale_text: 行商浪人收到了内政部某位高级官员员的联络。这位官员过去曾帮过忙，从库尔达家族手中取回了一件圣科尼亚蒂乌斯的遗物。他对行商浪人出手阔绰的贿赂念念不忘，又再度找上门来。这一回，作为回报，他承诺会让内政部的计算出现某些小小的差错，让来自穆尔科斯阿尔法星农业世界的物资补给全部运送到达戈努斯，而不是达戈尼斯二号海军轨道要塞。

languages.text: 以前、チョーダ家から聖コグナティウスの遺物を取り戻す手助けをした帝国行政局の高官から、ローグトレーダーに連絡があった。彼は手厚い賄賂を享受しながらも、さらに多額の賄賂を求めている。彼は富と引き換えに、帝国行政局の計算に誤差を生じさせ、マーカス・アルファの農業惑星からすべての食料を海軍の軌道要塞ドラゴニスIIではなくダルゴナスに輸送することを約束している。
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader has been contacted by a high-ranking Administratum official who previously helped with reclaiming a relic of Saint Cognatius from House Chorda. He enjoyed the generous bribes and would like some more. In exchange for the riches requested, he promises that an error will creep into the Administratum's calculations so that all provisions from the agri-world of Mircus Alpha will be shipped to Dargonus instead of the Navy's orbital fortress of Dragonis II.

traits.locale_text: 以前、チョーダ家から聖コグナティウスの遺物を取り戻す手助けをした帝国行政局の高官から、ローグトレーダーに連絡があった。彼は手厚い賄賂を享受しながらも、さらに多額の賄賂を求めている。彼は富と引き換えに、帝国行政局の計算に誤差を生じさせ、マーカス・アルファの農業惑星からすべての食料を海軍の軌道要塞ドラゴニスIIではなくダルゴナスに輸送することを約束している。

languages.text: {mf|Der Freihändler|Die Freihändlerin} wurde von einem hochrangigen Administratum-Beamten kontaktiert, der zuvor geholfen hat, ein Relikt von St. Cognatius aus dem Haus Chorda zu bergen. Das großzügige Bestechungsgeld hat ihm gefallen, er könnte noch mehr davon. Im Tausch gegen die angeforderten Reichtümer verspricht er, dass sich ein Fehler in die Berechnungen des Administratums einschleichen wird, so dass alle Vorräte von der Agrarwelt Mircus Alpha nach Dargonus geschickt werden, statt in die orbitale Festung Dragonis II der Flotte.
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader has been contacted by a high-ranking Administratum official who previously helped with reclaiming a relic of Saint Cognatius from House Chorda. He enjoyed the generous bribes and would like some more. In exchange for the riches requested, he promises that an error will creep into the Administratum's calculations so that all provisions from the agri-world of Mircus Alpha will be shipped to Dargonus instead of the Navy's orbital fortress of Dragonis II.

traits.locale_text: {{mf|Der Freihändler|Die Freihändlerin} wurde von einem hochrangigen Administratum-Beamten kontaktiert, der zuvor geholfen hat, ein Relikt von St. Cognatius aus dem Haus Chorda zu bergen. Das großzügige Bestechungsgeld hat ihm gefallen, er könnte noch mehr davon. Im Tausch gegen die angeforderten Reichtümer verspricht er, dass sich ein Fehler in die Berechnungen des Administratums einschleichen wird, so dass alle Vorräte von der Agrarwelt Mircus Alpha nach Dargonus geschickt werden, statt in die orbitale Festung Dragonis II der Flotte.

languages.text: Aziz Cognatius'un yadigârını Chorda Hanesi'nden geri alma konusunda yardımı dokunan üst kademe bir Administratum memuru, Hür Tacir'le iletişim kurmuş. Bol rüşvetlerden hoşnut kalmış ve dahasını istiyormuş. Talep ettiği servetin karşılığında Administratum'un hesaplarında bir hata meydana geleceğinin, böylece Mircus Alfa adlı zirai dünyada üretilen tüm erzakların Donanma buyruğundaki yörünge kalesi Dragonis II yerine Dargonus'a gönderileceğinin sözünü veriyor.
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader has been contacted by a high-ranking Administratum official who previously helped with reclaiming a relic of Saint Cognatius from House Chorda. He enjoyed the generous bribes and would like some more. In exchange for the riches requested, he promises that an error will creep into the Administratum's calculations so that all provisions from the agri-world of Mircus Alpha will be shipped to Dargonus instead of the Navy's orbital fortress of Dragonis II.
